title: Random Fps Drops
body: When I used to play league, my average fps consisted of around 150-200. Somewhat recently, I've been having consistent fps drops from 180 fps to around 10-30 fps every could of seconds. All my settings are already minimized and I've checked for driver updates yet the lag still occurs.

replies.body: You could have some outdated drivers or bad game files that can cause frames to drop like this.  Try out each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
